Description: The LG Hidden Menu component for Android on the LG Optimus G E973 allows physically proximate attackers to execute arbitrary commands by entering USB Debugging mode, using Android Debug Bridge (adb) to establish a USB connection, dialing 3845#*973#, modifying the WLAN Test Wi-Fi Ping Test/User Command tcpdump command string, and pressing the CANCEL button.
clean_description: lg hidden menu component android lg optimus g e973 allows physically proximate attackers execute arbitrary commands entering usb debugging mode using android debug bridge adb establish usb connection dialing 3845#*973# modifying wlan test wi-fi ping test/user command tcpdump command string pressing cancel button
